caption.p: Wind roses chart with wind speed (m s −1) and direction, corresponding to the whole time series of 2001–2013 and, in sequence, from December to February, beginning in the austral summer of December-2001 to February-2002 and ending in the austral summer of December-2012 to February-2013. Note that the wind rose from 2005 to 2006 is very dissimilar to others, but having the N = 860 of valid data points while the other wind roses have valid data points ranging from 2,130 to 2,190.
